Recent Videos.title: Wheel of Time TRAILER SECRETS & MYSTERIES Uncovered

Recent Videos.longDescription:
We'll breakdown every Wheel of Time Season 1 Episode in detail from the Teaser Trailer, official photos, news, leaks, social media hints, and rumors about scenes, directors, actors, and plots. Special guests Rebecca from Reading the Pattern YouTube channel, who recently became a Dragonmount.com Social Media Contributor, and Jon from WoT Up! will be joining us! It's time for another Episode Realignment! And, we'll take another shot at divining how Season One might turn out. Show up with your ideas, and maybe we'll even pull one of you into our panel!

PREVIOUS EPISODE BREAKDOWN
https://youtu.be/rpko_0w339w 

SPECIAL GUESTS
Rebecca from Reading the Pattern
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMpZ-mg0yyanYH-oin9kLAw

Jon from WoT Up!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbl0nJfwdXWANnKEURnFkHg

https://www.youtube.com/c/GeekyEri

1st Theory: Egwene's Ceremony (4:30)
BUBBLE OF EVIL AUDIO ISSUE: (13:50)

Recent Videos.longDescription:
Did you hear The Wheel of Time on Amazon Prime is releasing a Teaser Trailer this Thursday? Let's get together, breathe a bit, and chat about that Teaser image of Moiraine, talk Trailer Gai'don Bingo, what will constitute the Eyes of Ears Reporting, and just enjoy the hype of this moment of fandom together at The Dusty Wheel Inn, tonight!
